mapper.sql: select id id, user_id userId, app_id appId, token token, remark remark, serial_number serialNumber, imei imei, serve_area serveArea, device_type deviceType, is_deleted isDeleted, gmt_create gmtCreate, gmt_modified gmtModified from app_token_info
mapper.update: update app_token_info set is_deleted=1,gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id=#{id}
update app_token_info set is_deleted=1,gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id in (#{item})

update app_token_info set id=#{id}, user_id=#{userId}, app_id=#{appId}, token=#{token}, remark=#{remark}, serial_number=#{serialNumber}, imei=#{imei}, serve_area=#{serveArea}, device_type=#{deviceType}, gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id=#{id}

mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as id
insert into app_token_info ( id, user_id, app_id, token, remark, serial_number, imei, serve_area, device_type, is_deleted,gmt_create,gmt_modified ) values ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{appId}, #{token}, #{remark}, #{serialNumber}, #{imei}, #{serveArea}, #{deviceType}, 0,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

insert into app_token_info ( id, user_id, app_id, token, remark, serial_number, imei, serve_area, device_type, is_deleted,gmt_create,gmt_modified ) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.userId}, #{item.appId}, #{item.token}, #{item.remark}, #{item.serialNumber}, #{item.imei}, #{item.serveArea}, #{item.deviceType}, 0,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
